website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular twin bed slats available, this stylish bed frame is sure to impress.
pros: Attractive faux leather headboard matches most bedroom decor
Option to purchase in different bed sizes
cons: A few customers complained that the wooden slats bend under heavy weight

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for the price. Updated 2018
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame arrived today and took me about an hour to assemble. As others have mentioned, it is nice that everything comes packaged in a zipper pocket behind the headboard. Also it is very sturdy. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a frame. Just though I would do a little update about the bed. 3/20/17. The bed is still holding together awesome. No rips or tears at all. Still lools brand new. Actually moved houses very well. Still love that it packs into itself. Still very satisfied with this purchase. :) 7/7/18 Still have it and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase Thus Far
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase for me, this is a really nice solid bed it took 45 mins to put it together myself, i follow this guys video tutorial [...] and it made it super simple, everything is in the headboard of the bed and it has a nice height off the ground i have a queen mattress i attached a picture to show the height from the ground
customer_reviews.author: The TROUBLESHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bed for a few years now and it still looks as good as the day we got it! Sturdy and holding up well. My hubby is on the large side and we haven’t had any issues. Doesn’t squeak, move or sag. Great product. Was easy to put together. We moved this bed to 3 different residences too. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: TeeGee

customer_reviews.title: I researched king size bed for months until I found something I actually could afford WHILE also looking good! The small slats t
customer_reviews.text: I really do have to give this one a 5 star. I researched king size bed for months until I found something I actually could afford WHILE also looking good! The small slats that go across the bed are attached with a ribbon that has Velcro on it...what a brilliant design. Keeps them spaced apart evenly and takes the guessing work out. I cut two big pieces of wood to be used as a base since I have memory foam (12") It works very well and I am really loving the bed. Been a few months and no complaints at all so far. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hmr1979

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor...
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start. Just don’t buy this bed. I’ve had it for 3 years, it’s EXTREMELY noisy. Even turning over in the middle of the night the creaking is so loud. I’ve had 2 different good quality mattresses on it and it’s still uncomfortable and gives me back issues. I’ve had random screws fall out onto the floor and I have no idea where they even came from which is dangerous. I emailed the company looking for maybe a credit towards a different bed or even a refund and they told me I’m out of the return window. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: An absolute Must if you have a cal king and you're currently sleeping on the floor with it. Which I was, for quite a while since I had no intention of spending the average amount of around 1,500 and up for some headboards...After browsing my options on amazon I Finally saw this right in the 300$ range..while skeptical at the price I decided to take my chances with zero regret. Incredibly Easy setup. a Monkey could Literally do it. in under 45 minutes. realistically. Build is nice and sturdy. no creaking or noise. very stable bed. satisfied purchase. 100% approved I'm also 6'6 and a 275lb. bodybuilder. (if your bed is breaking, I suggest you lose weight. negative raters. )
customer_reviews.author: brian gimpel

customer_reviews.title: Super duper satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was skeptical about buying this but it turned out to be a great product. No parts were stuffed/ripped/scratched etc. like some reviews say. It was honestly self explanatory and could be done without instructions. At least for me. I just got it, put it together and am currently on it with my boyfriend and it seems to be holding up just fine. It’s not squeaky. It’s perfect! I would recommend not using a box frame for this as you’ll only have about a foot of head board showing if you do. Overall a great product for the price. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shyanne romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Platform Bed -- Super Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice platform bed. All the part come inside the headboard that unzips from the back. Very easy to assemble. Many of the bolts are already attached to where they need to go -- you just need to loosen them up to put a part in and then retighten. Only issue I had was trying to get a sideboard into place and the faux leather pealing apart when sliding into place. If it wasn't for that I would give a full 5 stars but due to that issue I dock down to a 4.7 stars. Extra storage under bed or a place for a cat to slumber.
customer_reviews.author: cody989

customer_reviews.title: Bought several Zinus bed frames in the past, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought several Zinus bed frames in the past, but this one is a total lemon, The dimensions are not correct, the frame is about 3 in shorter than the specs,, and it could not fit a queen size mattress lengthwise. To cover the mistake and to make it fit with a queen size mattress, the manufacture decided to raise the railing on both sides of the frame for the slats to flush with top of the frame. And now the mattress does not tuck in but floats on the bed frame.. Contacted Zinus and left a message but have not heard back from them
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, headboard is short.
customer_reviews.text: Frame is good quality for the price. Received undamaged and with all the parts. Strongly advised having two people life the box if you have a king. Assembly only took about 30 minutes and the provided allen wrench. My only complaint is that the headboard is too short. As you can see in the pics once you put pillows on the bed you cant see the headboard. The point in buying a headboard is to be able to see it, it should be foot taller. Not having to use box springs lowered the bed dramatically. There is room for small totes underneath. Just put ti together, dont know how quiet or stable it is during adult ventures. Overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EH ER EH ER EH ER EH ER NOPE
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the frame gets squeaky as hell. I tighten all the screws up and a few months later. EH ER EH ER EH ER. If you're parents and it's late a night this IS NOT the bed frame for you (wink). Invest a little more $ into a sturdier frame. But if your living the single life or don't have kids, this frame will make you sound like a rock star jockey about to win the triple crown. Parents beware All others, have fun and piss off your neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: MP FROM CP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Better quality than what you get from IKEA for 1/2 the price. The slats are 3"+ apart so all matress manufacturers recommend to add more slats. 8-12 more slats are need. Measure the slat length for your frame. Homedepot and other big box stores sell trim boards by the foot that you cut to size in store. Look for pine boards 1/2" thick by 2_1/2" wide. The scu at Homedepot is 7_7330449212_3. Look for the following on the label at homedepot: LWM494, L492A-200RLC, 1/2x2 1/2×RL. Customer service can look up the product description for you. Keep in mind the boxed frame weighs about 90 pounds so you my need help moving it it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris W

customer_reviews.title: Smart design
customer_reviews.text: I love the smart design. Everything is simple and packed into the bed header. Took me by myself 30 mins to take it out and put everything together. I bought 2 of them and both looks good and very simple to put them together. No need the second person. You can do it yourself. In the future when I move taking apart would be simple and easy. Thought they should include the torque device that you can screw and unscrew faster and easier. That’s the only negative thing about it. Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Look, High Quality Packaging and Assembly Process, Sleeps Well
customer_reviews.text: Needed a queen platform bed in my "second" guest room, wanted to place a foam mattress so was hoping for a totally flat platform. I could tell that Zinus had great reviews, but was skeptical that the slat system could deliver the strong surface I thought would be needed. Took a chance because of the price, the availability, the style, and the good feedback on Zinus overall! Great decision -- the bed came before Christmas -- when I needed it, and putting it together was a very good experience. My guests did most of the assembly and said how impressed they were with the quality and packaging. I've slept on it myself since and agree it was a perfect choice!
customer_reviews.author: RaleighReviewer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again you just need to 3/4 plywood
customer_reviews.text: So the best thing to do is remove the slots and by 3/4 furniture grade plywood polyurethane and stain it and screw it in this way your mattress will be supported all the way otherwise your mattress will not get the support it needs once this is done you'll find the bed completely sturdy unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Tordella

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've only been sleeping in it for a week but I'm in love. I can't make this bed make any noise, which was the problem with my old bed. It's sturdy and clean looking. I got the king size. Your pillows do not fall between the headboard and the mattress. It isn't too high to get into( I'm handicapped). No dips anywhere since you don't need the twin foundations. I've seen much more fancy and expensive beds but this one is just as good and far less money. Also, I was looking for vinyl and not leather bc my cats are drawn to the scent of leather to scratch but not vinyl. Happy all round with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roseboro

customer_reviews.title: How hard is your job???
customer_reviews.text: Multiple parts came damaged and some idiot put a bracket on upside down when making....and its the wrong one and doesn’t match the other 3. Now that corner isn’t holding any weight and will come crashing down when the screws loosen. stacked some 2x4’s under it for now until i make a new bracket. Don’t even want to bother calling these clowns and asking for the right part. save your money folks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, sturdy and nice-looking!
customer_reviews.text: In my house, I’m always the one to assemble the furniture. My husband doesn’t follow the directions very well, so things sometimes come out wrong when he does it. I assembled a queen platform bed similar to this a couple years ago, and it took about three hours. This bed has an amazingly simplified set-up that took a total of maybe 30-45 minutes by myself. I think it took longer to haul it from our porch to our room than it did to assemble it! I am very impressed with the finished product and would highly recommend it! Great price for a great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality brand, and 0 customer support
customer_reviews.text: Had this bed for less then 2 years and since like 6 months In, it's had issues with the legs in the middle and sides giving way, it also sinks down in the middle. It's the most uncomfortable frame I've ever owned. Causing my wife and I to have to lay in an exact spot facing a certain way in order to not feel like we're sliding towards the middle, or sliding away from it. We have to choose over or the other. I am trashing this and buying another, Zinus is a terrible quality brand
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: When I started putting it together I panicked a little. It looked as if I just got a headboard, but no, it's all IN the headboard when shipped. I put it together on my own. It was very simple to do. It is surprisingly sturdy and quiet. I love the leather look and that the whole base finish is the faux leather, not just metal bars. Total win for me. Love it. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bedframe!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bedframe for about 8 weeks, and I'm loving it! Sturdy, strong and looks very nice too. Not much to say. The best part is that the wooden slats are attached to the bed via Velcro (genius and very thoughtful). From what I understand, many slats are screwed onto the bedframe, which can loosen over time, especially if you plan to move multiple times....(think repetitive removal and assembly).
customer_reviews.author: Picky Palate

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and upscale. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this platform bed to anyone who wants to add sophistication to their bed set. It's super sturdy, I weigh 260 lbs and is not squeaky. I was nervous to buy something that looked this great for such a low price, but I'm extremely happy I did. I've had this for 7 months and I'm happy I made the purchase. You can even use the flat top of the headboard to put things like remotes or headphone charges for easy access (see my picture). It also comes with an optional foot board which I didn't want, but the whole thing looks premium for a non-premium price. One of my favorite buys in the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Ben O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Holding up after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking into this product, (exactly 5 years ago) I was very curious about the sturdiness because the price seemed like a good deal. So now I'm writing this review to say that after 5 years it turned out to be a great purchase. Fair to mention though that by now I am starting to notice squeaks and creeks. (I'm about 170lbs my wife 130lbs) I think for durability purposes 3 -5 years seems like an appropriate time frame. Hope this helps, overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame is significantly underpriced
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together without following the directions, that's how easy it was to assemble. It is SUPER STURDY, and the best money we've ever spent on a bed frame. I was pleasantly surprised in the overall quality, sturdiness, look, storage space underneath, and the way the bed doesn't remotely move. It doesn't need a box spring, and it sits up high. If you're looking for an affordable quality bed frame, this is the purchase you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: RoseFromConcrete

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC VALUE INCREDIBLY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Amazon shopper for many years and this is the first time I've felt compelled to write a review. This platform bed is the best! It is beautifully made and packaged. It looks like real leather. It is super sturdy and installation takes minutes. All the pieces are ingeniously packed inside the headboard. This is the first product I have seen where ALL STYROFOAM pieces inside the box (for safe shipping) are sealed in plastic so that not a particle of Styrofoam mess gets on your floor. If you need a platform bed, don't hesitate. This is a manufacturer to watch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frame because I was tired of the normal metal frames that squeak and are just ugly overall. This was super easy to set up and came with all tools and parts to assemble along with extras just in case. So far we’ve had this for a few months and it’s great! I love the storage capacity underneath and love the style of it! It does not make any noise whatsoever and just looks so much better than any metal frame thing. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Buesa

customer_reviews.title: I live everything about this bed.
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this bed! It arrived fast and all the parts were contained in the headboard. Seriously genius packaging. Secondly, I arranged for someone to help me assemble it and finished by myself before they arrived. The instructions were easy to follow and it was clearly designed to make assembling easy. The bed is sturdy and beautiful. I could not be happier. I usually complete these reviews at the request of the sender or if I am upset with the product, but not this time. I was so pleasantly impressed that I felt compelled to share. Did I mention that the price was also more than fair. So happy with my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble screws already in place just gotta unscrew hook parts together definitely need help putting together seems pretty sturdy I’m over 200 pounds 5”10 just mee I will purchase a wood slate just to be on the safe side for those extra activities if you know what I mean lol
customer_reviews.author: Melanin.poppin33

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks super nice
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded to a king bed and needed a new bed frame. My husband put it together last night in about an hour. It was super easy, directions easy to follow, parts clearly labeled. No screws or nails to hammer in. The bottom slats seem really sturdy- love that they attached with velcro. The color was as expected and looks nice in our bedroom. Obviously only had it one night, but as of now, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Shields

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  An item that is easy to assemble:)
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered many items online recently to furnish my son's home on a budget. I saw this headboard and frame and decided to have it delivered, without assembly. I'm 61 years old and have an aversion to reading directions. This company made it so easy that I assembled the headboard and frame by myself in less than 1 hour. They even included a super cute card and a handy ratchet, allen wrench to make it even easier. Lots of thought went into the packaging. Kudos to Zinus. I'm a very impressed shopper:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame for the price
customer_reviews.text: About as expected. Looks nice and easy to assemble. Seems to be pretty sturdy. My Allswell queen mattress fits on it appropriately. One of the panels for the side of the bed arrived damaged (see photo) but with everything assembled it isn’t that noticeable. The package as it arrives is really heavy. I had to unpack it in my entryway and carry the pieces upstairs separately. For this reason I doubt I would pack it all back together if I ever need to move it again.
customer_reviews.author: JVarn74

customer_reviews.title: Looks Striking. Easy to Assemble. Very Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This item looks just as striking in person as it does in the manufacturers photos. Zinus is AWESOME! I've bought many assembly-yourself furniture pieces from Target, Walmart and IKEA, but this one was different. It was far more intelligently engineered that others, the instructions were clear, they gave you extra screws, and assembly was a breeze. Like 45 minutes. And its sturdy!! People think I spent three or four times more than I really did and knowing I can disassemble it and put everything back into the headboard gives me comfort for my next move. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Logan D.

customer_reviews.title: THE MATTRESS WILL SLIP AND SLIDE
customer_reviews.text: This frame is sturdy and easy enough to put together. The slats fit flush with the top of the frame, so there is nothing to keep the mattress from shifting. Some sticky tape on the tops of the slats is supposed to hold mattress secure. It does not...........As soon as tape gets lint on it, no more sticky. Plan on a Surprise if you sit on edge of the mattress. I am looking for a better platform bed frame now. It will have raised edges deep enough to catch and hold the mattress in place.
customer_reviews.author: bjf

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much from this bed due to the price but I was pleasantly surprised. This is a very nice looking and sturdy bed. It looks like it cost way more than what I paid for it. It was very easy to assemble and I have not found any defects in it since I have had it. The parts to put it together are inside a zippered compartment on the back of the headboard...pretty great idea. Would highly recommend this bed,
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Having read some of the reviews that reported ripped fabric and other damages, I was a bit nervous ordering this bed frame. The UPS man kindly stood by while I opened the double cardboard box, and found everything in perfect condition. The various parts all went together easily and without any confusion. The artificial leather material is soft and pliable. The embedded bolts all lined up perfectly, and the steel frame base is very secure and strong. Excellent engineering and quality control. Headboard is sturdy and there's very little back and forth flex. I've used this frame under a heavy mattress for several weeks, and still am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: No squeaks looks sleek must get it!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up loving this so much! It’s sturdy! No noise comes from this frame! It is a bit high up with my mattress (my feet dangle when I’m sitting on the edges) also the back of the frame is a cool storage pocket (which contains the planks in it) a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I like the bed
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed, but be carefull while purchasing products from Zinus... If something goes wrong or/and you miss a part, forget about getting any help from the manufacturer. During assembling of the bed one of the parts got broken, and now I'm stuck with the broken bed, and no way to contact Zinus. I have called them multiple times, always getting to the voice mail; every time I left a message, but had never gotten any response. I have also opened a ticket via their Web site, nothing ever come in response. I will be happy to update my review as soon as I am contacted by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is top notch. When it got here, I wasn’t so sure. The box is extremely heavy and I had to wrangle it inside myself. I suggest leaving the box in a main room and carrying the bed in pieces to its final destination. Putting it together was a breeze by myself, and it’s SO sturdy! I’m higher off the ground in this bed than I was in my traditional “box springs and frame” bed with the same mattress. It’s an attractive bed with the brown leather too. Wonderful bed, I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: They fixed the issue that others are reporting
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed frame for 3 weeks now, and other than having to tighten the bolts a second time after a few nights, it's holding up well. It feels solid, the headboard is comfortable to lean against, and the assembly was super easy for 1 person. I was concerned about the reviews of part of the rail support breaking off. However ours has additional brackets under the supports to reinforce it. We were going to do that ourselves during assembly, and we were pleased to see the manufacturer had taken steps to improve the product!
customer_reviews.author: OffroadTreks

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble by yourself in less than an ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble by yourself in less than an hour. Instructions are pictures and understandable. *one of the metal support pieces on the side rail was really bent, made it difficult to tighten screws there Sturdy, no squeaking, holds my Zinus 12" memory foam mattress just fine. Great value and fashionable/modern looking. It doesn't look like a cheap bed frame. You could store items under the bed but you better not want easy access. You would have to lift the mattress and wooden slats so you could put some boxes there. Great for keeping empty boxes in between moves perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jan Itor

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap!no one told me how heavy this thing is it's a beast! I feel so sorry (and grateful) to the delivery driver 😓 No wonder it arrived a few days later than expected- they had to wait for the Incredible Hulk to come in to work. I haven't set it up yet nearly broke my toe when it landed on my foot so must be good quality, I'm excited to find out! Nice and sturdy! I could not lift this into the car. And even if I could have it probably wouldn't have fit. Definitely gonna need help with this one. But cant wait to update once I get it all set up.
customer_reviews.author: H's_Truth

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the headboard & that everything came zipped up in it. I love the fact that each side board has 3 support screws & there's 10 slats!!! The last frame I bought from a furniture store for twice the price only had 4 & was a made out of a cheap hollow alloy. I can't believe the quality for the price of this & it goes great w/my new Classic 14" mattress I just bought from Amazon too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bed frame. I liked how everything is packed inside the head rest for convenience. The color and the feel of the leather is nice and cool. Took me about half an hour to set it up by myself. It is sturdy and will support more than 750lbs so far, I know this because 4 of my friends and I laid on it and I'm sure that's more than 800 altogether. Ignore the negative feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bed for the money. It is well-constructed, well-packaged, and easy to assemble. The hardest part was dragging it into my house from my porch. I am 5'1" and 108 pounds, but I was able to move and assemble this on my own in about an hour. I wish it came in white. The material is good-quality and leather-like. I am interested to see how well it holds up over time. Because everything comes packed inside the headboard, this bed could probably be disassembled and repackaged the same way for moving, etc. Good design. The cheapest part is the legs. They are hollow plastic. However, once assembled, they look fine.
customer_reviews.author: Micabe

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to expect at the price point. Was pleasantly surprised. Can’t say much for assembly, I paid to have it assembled and they did a great/quick job. Not sure I would’ve been so efficient myself. The storage capacity is limited to the headboard but there’s a large zipper back there for you to store some things. Wouldn’t put anything heavy or too large back there as the backing is cloth and it’ll show. Also not the easiest to access in most cases. The headboard is beautiful and modern though. I love the way it looks and the long legs are so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Asma

customer_reviews.title: Not the frame you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but couldn't. The frame came damaged with some torn upholstery, a smashed corner on the headboard, smashed corner on the front cross beam that had the bolts for the side rail smashed up so far that you couldn't even get to them, and the screw-in feet weren't properly aligned. The price seemed good but is reflective of the quality of craftsmanship. It's going back and I'm going to get something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: We switched out our humongous, we call it our "Soprano's," bed frame for this minimalist one. I wasn't sure if I would like it at first, but it is great! Our other bed sat so high that I had to step up on the frame and hop onto the bed. This one, all I have to do is sit down. It has clean lines, is easy to assemble and disassemble and it is super sturdy. We have a really heavy mattress on it and my husband and I are no lightweights, for sure. I did worry that it wouldn't be able to hold us and our super duper mattress, but it is very sturdy. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Pizzity

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! with terrible delivery..
customer_reviews.text: First...Delivery process was TERRIBLE. Bought via prime and it was over 1 1/2 weeks late and had to be ordered a 2nd time! That was a bummer..although this could be due to local carrier issue.. it is something to keep in mind when ordering. However the bed is awesome! The packaging was perfect and compact. All pieces were included. Sometimes the directions with "put together" furniture are impossible for me and my husband has to sit it but these were SUPER easy. I was able to put this together by myself without any challenges. Everything fit perfectly in place. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shedd Family

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: I had this for about 2 months before my boyfriend and I broke the frame. If you've got a healthy sex life this bed isn't for you. It's really pretty, but it just couldn't withstand the storm.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this bedframe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old who wanted a "cool" new big boy room. Thought this would be a great addition to have and he can grow into his teenage years with. This bed frame is so sturdy and easy to put together. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this brand. I have a king size one in a different style that I have had for over 3 years and moved 2 times with it. It still makes no sound and is so well built.
customer_reviews.author: Texasgal

customer_reviews.title: 4years later and I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this amazing frame for about 4 years now! And honestly I can’t believe how much I still love it! Great quality! No tears fading nothing is broken! Barely writing a review because I was trying to suggest it to someone!!! Love it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up bedframe!
customer_reviews.text: this was my purchase of a king size bedframe with headboard. i once again had to follow what had the most satisified customers and this product seemed to have it. so i bought it. i have to say the setup/installation of this bedframe was very very simple! the instructions provided were easy to follow and came with the necessary tools needed to put this together. after about 15 to 20 minutes, it was all put together and ready for the king mattress. it looks great and the headboard goes very well with it. i'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy while maintaining beauty. The faux leather is of great quality. Bed was easy to assemble. I put it together by myself in less than 45 mins. Probably could have gotten it together faster, but I distracted. Perfectly matched the rest of my "espresso" colored furniture. I am planning to purchase this bed again for my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Saint

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Packaging not so good. Quality okay
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame itself is great. But delivery/packaging wasn't satisfactory. I received it with a rip in the leather and another rip on the inside fabric. The box packaging was damaged, so it seemed like a fork lift or dolly was used in the heavy package which pierced the box right into the bed frame. Not sure of the quality and how long this bed frame will hold up over the years... I guess time will tell, but looking how the screws are designed to hold up the headboard and footboard, I'm not too sure it will.
customer_reviews.author: EuEu

customer_reviews.title: You read the reviews but u hope it wont happen to you
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the bed after reading 100's of reviews.. The box arrived with a huge hole in the side. We hoped it would be OK.. Once open it is AN AWESOME looking bed. Yet it was damaged in shipping. We didn't wanna pay the money to ship it back. We SUPER glued the tears. Some came from shipping damage .. It is packed in the headboard which is cool BUT THE METAL TEARS THE FAUX LEATHER. again the bed is beautiful and STURDY. TOOK 30 mins to put together. We took a gamble praying the shipping wouldn't be the terror. The bed it's self is a wonderful sturdy purchase. The super glue repairs are a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece ! Exactly what I wanted and very attractive. The faux leather is a deep chocolate and a nice quality! It only took about 20 minutes from opening the box to finish and all the tools come with it! Thank you for that nice touch. The base seems very sturdy and new Sealy mattress I got was a perfect fit. No box spring needed!
customer_reviews.author: HKClassical

customer_reviews.title: Treat her gently...
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy bed frame at a great price. Luckily I didn't have the packing issues which may have been fixed now that Amazon is delivering their own packages! But I get what people are saying about the legs on this bed frame being "fragile/flimsy". I spent some time to ensure I tightened down the hardware but if I had to move this on the carpet with the weight of the mattress (or the frame itself for that matter) I wouldn't do it without having someone help me lift it to move it (for fear the legs would buckle in a terrible carpet snagging accident). To summarize be gentle when moving but in place its as sturdy as you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: 303isWhereiBe

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy box. I could tell right then this was going to be good quality. All the parts are packed inside the zipped up back of the padded headboard. I got it all out and together in about 30 mins. Very easy to assemble. Not sure why anyone complained about the slats. They seem pretty sturdy to me since they are tightly spaced and held in place by Velcro. Got my mattress up on and it boy is it sturdy. Have not used it for anything but sleep but I am sure it will hold up to most activities no problem. Very impressed for a bed you put together
customer_reviews.author: Scum1

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BRILLIANT! BRILLIANT!! BRILLIANT!!! From the creative way the materials were shipped (all parts conveniently located in a zippered portion of the head board). Intelligent assembly (you Do Not receive a bag full of bolts, screws and nuts). You receive the furniture with the screws already inserted in the locations they need to be. When assembling, all that is required is the loosing of the preset screws so that sections of the frame can be attached to the frame. We particularly enjoyed the thought behind attaching Velcro to the wood slats (which support the bed) and to the edges of the bed frame such that the slats stay in place and will not slide to and fro
customer_reviews.author: DRAGABOND76

customer_reviews.title: False warranty
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but the advertised “Worry-free 5 year limited manufacturer warranty included” is a lie. One of the parts was ripped. I registered the bed on the Zinus website and requested a replacement part only for Zinus to tell me I have to go by Amazon’s return replacement policy and package the product back up and send it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: HK4ever

customer_reviews.title: Finally A Good Night Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This platform frame is fabulous. At first I thought a bed without a box spring won't be comfortable. Boy was I wrong! No back aches like I normally had with a iron frame bed. So comfy with my pillow top mattress. It was easy to put together, about 20/30 minutes with my hubby assisting. Loving the height too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doreem

customer_reviews.title: Needs more support
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and was easy enough to put together, but I am extremely concerned over the stability of the boards. We purchased a king-size, and I'm afraid that the width between stability posts will not be enough to support adult weight over time on those flimsy boards. I really like everything else about it, but the boards used on the king size are far too thin and narrow. I have a feeling we'll be purchasing some plywood to put on top, which I feel we shouldn't have to do buying a new product.
customer_reviews.author: nlindsey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews. However, this bed warranted the time to go back find the item and review it. This bed has surpassed my expectations! We figured it was a cheap mail order bed but it would probably work for our sons room for a couple of years. It came in and it is VERY well made. It is sturdy and after a couple of years of my 7-9 year son being less than gentle on it. It is still as sturdy as the day we assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica king

customer_reviews.title: was a crappy $100 version
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of platforms! However, I always bought cheaper ones, which I’ve always had to replace in a few months, from accidentally breaking them, from jumping on them, or flopping on them to hard. The previous platform, that this one replaced, was a crappy $100 version. No great at all! But this platform is great! Makes my bed more firm and don’t have my wife and I sinking in to the bed like the other did! We love it! Solid bed. Now my only problem, when unboxing it and opening it, the headboard has a gash in it. Other than that it’s wonderdul.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great looking
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this same bed when I lived in California, in black, and so when I went looking for a bed in Arizona, I bought this one again, this time in brown. Performs as good as the first, yet this one has better capacity for under-bed storage since it is a little higher. Can't say enough for Sinus products. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Soft,  durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Everything was excellent from unpackaging the frame to putting it up. The color is more blackished with faint brown tones. I needed to match the furniture you see in photo. It goes, looks fine though my set is more brownish toned. Nice quality, seems durable, I’m 143 lbs. don’t know how it will hold with 2 people. You can put a board down if it gives in and need more support. If in doubt and colors match, go for it. I’m sure you will be happy. I like that My head has some soft cushion when watching TV or sitting up and when I bang my shin, it’s softer. I’m enjoying mine. Was delivered quickly and on time too!👌
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap bed, but protect your investment
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so you're paying under $200 for a king size bed, then want to cry it isn't the quality of a $2000 bed...got it. This bed is just fine, but you might as well throw the slats it comes with away, they're like a trampoline when you push down on them and aren't much better than cardboard. Get some 3/4" material instead, also there were a few complaints about the legs, so you can drill an extra hole in the frame on them and add a bolt as pictured. The bed does seem pretty nice, I got a full size for my daughter and it seemed full size doesn't require the extra steps for support.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape. It's really cool how all the pieces are creatively packaged inside the headboard. It wasn't hard to put together and seems sturdy. My only complaint is the headboard had some kind of oil on it that smelled bad. I finally washed it several times with warm water and dish soap to get it out. It made my pillow case and top of my comforter smell. After several wipe downs I got it out. I suggest if you get this bed, wash the headboard first before you put it together. For the price it's a nice looking bed and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherluthien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!! Super happy.
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase! Inexpensive yet great quality and very sturdy. Very easily assembled by one person. Height is high enough that you can store things under the bed.. Sleek look. Love that you don't need a box spring or bed skirt!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this bed completely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by this platform bed! Not only is this bed completely easy to put together, it is sturdy as heck and gorgeous! One huge plus that I was not aware of when I purchased this particular bed frame is on the back of the headboard, there is storage for the bed parts when it is taken a part. This is how it comes packages as well. Every single piece needed for the bed fits perfectly in the zippered hallowed out area in the back of the headboard. Convenient and quite thoughtful! This will make it much easier to keep track of all of the pieces if I ever need to disassemble and move the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We love our king size Zinus bed! We used to have a large sleigh bed but it was too big for our bedroom. We had already bought two Zinus full size beds for our kids and they were very easy to put together and were holding up very well so we bought this one. This one even came with a ratcheting Allen wrench that made assembly much faster and easier. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $150, this is great! Assembly was easy enough. No extra tools necessary. It feels sturdy. It's only been 2 days since I've had it but so far so good. There were some rips and holes in the fabric which is why I gave it 4 stars, but for the price I guess you can expect a little less than perfection. However, I would still recommend this bed because it looks like it costs way more than it does.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Quickie Review
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Price! Wow, cheapest bed I've seen. - I was worried about this purchase at first, but after putting it together, I was really surprised how great it looked. - Solid construction and insanely easy to assemble. Cons: - From my experience, faux leather starts showing it's wear pretty quickly. I've had this for almost a year now and it still shows good with 0 signs of wear. However, I do try to keep off the leather sides as much as possible since I am not sure how durable this is. I will update if I see any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: CS Tech Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great for the price I paid and it definitely doesn't look cheap. I decided to go with leather specifically so that I can get a high headboard that is soft to lean against vs wood that requires a pillow. Since I have limited storage space, in the absence of built in storage, I wanted a bed that is slightly high so I could put some storage boxes there and this is perfect. That said, given that its slightly higher, if you don't like high beds, I wouldn't recommend a 12 inch mattress to go with this cause the bed is super high now, especially with a mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon R

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, fair deal
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy winner. Great quality, fair price, solid construction and easy to assemble. After buying one we actually bought another one a week later. It’s that good. If you need an inexpensive good quality non-particle board bed that feels solid and looks great look no further. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Ig

customer_reviews.title: Assembly parts not included
customer_reviews.text: Not happy already. Product did not come with any of the assembly parts. It came with one Allen wrench and one of each part that is needed. So apparently you have to go to the hardware store and buy the rest of the parts. So I already took my old bed apart and I'm trying to put my new one together quick and then go to bed but apparently I'm going to be sleeping on the couch tonight because all hardware stores are closed until morning. I wish somewhere this would've stated that it doesn't come with the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great little one-person bed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking surprisingly solid little platform bed frame we set up in our apartment as an "escape bed" when one of us starts snoring in the big king size bed in the bedroom. With the 10" Zinus Memory Foam Green Tea Mattress, it is almost perfect, as we are both "firm mattress" people and the lack of box springs under a conventional mattress or the wires on a roll-away bed you can get for a little less money, this bed suited us perfectly. I got it out of the box and had it all set up in about an hour mostly using the tools that came with it and a box knife.
customer_reviews.author: The Ayres

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Really.wow!i dont review much,but i love how this bed looks,feels and even how neatly packed it arrived! I opened the box and to my surprise theres only a headboard! I unzipped it and there were other pieces neatly stacked. Its super easy to put together. It took me maybe 30-40min with a 3.5yr old around 🤷‍♀️ my son loved it. Its very sturdy and fancy looking! He likes the secret hiding spot behind his headboard haha. Ill be getting another in bigger size for my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: even for 2 people (although the UPS guy did it by himself with great effort). That is why they all come damaged
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for 3 months now and so far no complaints. It did come damaged on the backside. The manufacturer should really ship this thing in more than one box. The box is way too heavy to lift, even for 2 people (although the UPS guy did it by himself with great effort). That is why they all come damaged, because while trying to move the box it gets dropped or thrown because it must weigh close to 150 lbs. Luckily what was damaged on ours does not show, so it's ok and the bed itself is very sturdy, well made. The price is phenomenal, so I would still recommend this bed to anyone. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Frame!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to first say that this bed has been great. I love the way it looks! We also purchased a Zinus memory foam mattress and the two go together well. The bed is a pretty good height and offers a bit of storage space. My only complaint was that it seems that we got a bed that had already been used. Some of the zip ties that held the slats together were already cut, we noticed some marks and scuffs on the bed. In addition, we noticed that one of the panels was a little bent and that only happens after you try to attach the bed to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nice looking faux leather bedframe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my brother. He absolutely loves it. I only saw it straight out of the box but the Faux leather looked and felt nice. Everything comes in a zippered compartment within the headboard which is nice and convenient. He said setup wasn't too difficult. Frame sits about 4 or 5 inches from the floor. Another reviewer mentioned that the slats that came with their bed were metal, however, this frame came with thin wooden slats. They looked a little thin to me for the weight of a mattress but they seem to be holding up just fine. Overall very happy with this purchase! If this review was helpful please click Yes below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This bed exceeded my expectations! It’s sturdy, good quality, and so easy to put together! It looks just like the picture and I’m just amazed at the great deal I got for the bed compared to the price I would have payed at a furniture store. Definitely happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed! Easy to assemble and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest things I’ve ever assembled. I did it on my own in less than an hour. Everything came well packaged with straight forward/easy instructions and tools needed. Love how tight and polished the leather looks and I also love the height from the floor. The bed is very sturdy with me and my husband both being on the heavier side. We have since moved it to our young son’s room and it is still holding up like a champ. My first review ever but it has to be shared. Totally a great buy for a great price and more sturdy than my Ashley Furniture bed that I paid triple+ the price for. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Genevah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 12" foam mattress. It was really easy to put together and there's more room under it than I realized. I was worried I might feel "low" compared to the mattress & big spring & bed frame I came from but it doesn't feel low at all. There's also no gap under the headboard so no more pillows falling down. With the 12" foam mattress I have on it, there's still plenty of headboard room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER EASY TO PUT TOGETHER. I am middle aged, not super strong, and not mechanically inclined but I put this whole king-sized thing together in an hour. A normal person would probably have it together in 15 - 30 minutes. There are literally 8 screws, if I recall. That's it! Seems super sturdy. Looks great. (Just a word to the not-good-with-putting-things-together people like me, you can save time by unscrewing the pre-installed screws just a bit so it's easier to slip the whole thing together, then go back and tighten them up when you are done). Really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: AGirlNamedTBone

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great frame
customer_reviews.text: This is the one! Easy to assemble, sturdy, and well made all in one. Bonus it looks great too!. I put it together alone within an hour with only the Alan wrench and a box knife. Perfect inexpensive frame for my 11yr old daughter! This is day one, but if it falls apart or ends up being junk ill update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Ajbcat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's well built, and my son and I had it assembled in 10-15 minutes. Just one star however, because their measurements are wrong. There's NOT 7.5" from the frame to the floor, more like 6.25". That 7.5" was a primary reason I bought the frame, because I needed the storage space. You think you're getting more space than a regular frame, but you're getting less. I nearly sent it back on their dime. FIX YOUR INFO. SELLER, IT"S WRONG.
customer_reviews.author: zzspiral

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 other Zinus platform frames and loved them both. However this one isn't my favorite, I don't like the way its put together and I don't like the plastic legs. ALSO I have an 11 inch mattress and I don't like the overall height at all, I'm 6'2" and I have to lift up to get into bed. I love platform beds because of their simplicity and low form and this one is not at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is unfortunate but one of the 4 pieces that go on the length of the frame had broken wood and it punctured the leather. Amazon CS advised me to contact seller and they haven’t responded to my voice message yet. I am busy and a tiny lady to ship back this heavy frame and I guess I am stuck with it. Other than that, it is simple to assemble and the parts are perfect fit. I actually love it for the price except this defect that took away my excitement. I will update once I hear from them or Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: fitE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This bedframe is gorgeous and was very easy to assemble. I was impressed with how all the pieces were zippered into the headboard and everything was super organized. They also included a set of spare nuts and bolts that were labeled as such... and the ratchet that came with the set if super handy and really good quality. If you are considering this frame, I say do it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KaraBearz

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We just received it today. It came one day earlier than expected. It was pretty heavy and we weren’t home when Amazon delivered it. Poor guy who did it, because we live in the 2nd floor. Everything comes inside the headboard and everything arrived in neat condition. The instructions are pretty easy to understand. It took us (my 12 yo boy, my husband and me) about 45 minutes to put it together. So far seems sturdy and good quality for the price. We (me and my husband) are 5’ 3” and 5’ 7” and weight together maybe a little less than 300 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mag Rams

customer_reviews.title: looks great, sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a frame fast because our last one failed without warning. I had already researched Zinus frames in planning to replace our teens beds so I knew where to look. The frame arrived safely in a double layer box with all the frame parts packed inside the headboard how smart. The frame is very sturdy and well made, it even made our old mattress feel 100% better. Very clear directions easy to assemble with the included hex wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together! beautifully engineered! Just follow the photos exactly! Looks fantastic! I am 72 and put it together by myself. The box weighed 150# and I was extremely lucky that the delivery man (who worked alone!) was able to carry it into my house. It was too heavy and bulky for me to help him, but as long as he could get it inside the front door I could take it apart and carry it by pieces to the master bedroom. Having an extra hand around or at least a furniture dolly would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Wow. So easy to put together and sturdy. Deserves engineering award
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This bed was almost enjoyable to put together. Give an engineering award to whoever designed this bed. It's really ingeniously put together. Puts IKEA to shame. You first think you didn't get all the parts until you start putting together and realize they give you extra parts. And this bed is super sturdy. And I didn't even put it against the wall. I love this bed. The price is amazing of course. Seriously happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: A Q

customer_reviews.title: The frame is sturdy, attractive
customer_reviews.text: I've spent weeks trying to decide if I wanted this frame. Wasn't sure it would be manufactured well due to the low price. I was wrong. The frame is sturdy, attractive, and super easy to put together. All the tools and components come in one box, organized inside the head board. The only concern I have is the mattress I ordered from the same company doesn't fully fit in the queen frame. Not sure if it's the frame or the mattress. I would recommend this to anyone over a Ikea style bed. -james simmonds
customer_reviews.author: mechanicalheart

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame in July 2017 and am writing this review in February 2018. I wasn’t sure how the bed would hold up, especially since I have a 100lb dog and a 50lb dog constantly jumping on and off. It has held up well and actually looks quite nice. The box the bed comes in is heavy, which is not surprising. We used two people to put it together and didn’t rush. The directions were good, everything fit together nicely. I can recommend this for anyone looking for an inexpensive, solid bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for price.  Hopefully you wont get an open box/return like I did.  Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: Low price. Easy to assemble. Well designed, but low quality components. Purchased for limited use in guest bedroom. Material quality: minus 1 star for cheap materials- unzip back of head board to view how headboard is made of stapled together (no glue/screw) undersized wooden components. Service - minus 1 star because mine was an open/returned box (apparent from open baggies and clipped zip ties left inside headboard) PLUS damaged (possibly during shipping - hard to say). Unfortunately I needed to use it right away or I would have returned it. Instead I repaired the broken cross-piece inside the headboard frame (not viewable once assembled).
customer_reviews.author: T. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So happy I read and trusted the reviews on this bed, all I have to say is very satisfied. Besides needing help to get it upstairs (very heavy), my 6 month pregnant self, little assistance from my over 60yr old mom and with a 18m old trying to help I was able to put the whole bed together in less than two hours with a few breaks in between. So so far so good. Looks good and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: CAME WITH TEARS IN THE LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame looks very nice and is very sturdy, comes well packaged and they even give you extra hardware in case you lose anything. The only issue I have is that it came with tears in FOUR different places in the leather, which I am very upset about, I had the option to buy it used but I bought it new because I thought it would come in perfect condition, I was very wrong. If I would’ve known it was going to arrive with all these tears I would’ve just saved 50$ and ordered it used. Other than that. Everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: monique kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Between the sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I was very frightening to purchase furniture through an online service. However this was just what I need it sturdy and secure sits high off the floor so offers a lot of storage space for shoes underneath the bed. I apply my box springs and mattress which left a little room for a headboard to be visible , however I don't mind that. Without box springs the bed was it way too low for me. The furniture is not too bulky so did it's justice in my bedroom 12x36. I have a his and her closet and I for master bath and still had room for this entire bed and a single dresser
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

product_meta.title: Zinus Gerard Faux Leather Upholstered Platform Bed Frame / Mattress Foundation / Wood Slat Support / No Box Spring Needed / Easy Assembly, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Design:Platform BedBold and modern style comes front and center with the Gerard Faux Leather Platform Bed. For starters, its deep espresso vegan leather upholstery makes a luxurious statement right out of the gate. Further enhanced by a distinct, squared off headboard with sleek vertical stitching, the Gerard is the perfect complement to any modern or glam contemporary interior. But this frame has more to offer than just its brooding good looks. It’s built strong with a sturdy steel interior framework and dependable wood slats that can support your mattress without the box spring. An underbed clearance space of nearly 10 inches adds an unexpected dose of functionality to this design, almost like a bonus closet where you can tuck away extra linens, clothes, shoes or luggage. And believe it or not, this grand statement piece is shipped to your door in manageable pieces with all the tools and instructions you need to put it together. Along with it, you get the peace of mind that comes with its worry-free 5 year warranty and its thousands of glowing customer reviews. Now that’s what we call satisfaction in a box.
feature_bullets: TALL, DARK & HANDSOME - Make an impression without screaming for attention with this edgy, modern platform bed design. A striking deep espresso faux leather upholstery and padded headboard with vertical stitching pull together your room with sophistication

DURABLE & FUNCTIONAL - Steel framework and foam padding add comfort and longevity; underbed clearance space of 9.8 inches is great for storage; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Durable wood slats support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring; for the twin and full sizes, slats are spaced 2.8 inches apart, and for other sizes, slats are spaced 3.3 inches apart
Dimensions and Weight: 75.5" X 38" X 15.75", 70.5 lbs || Headboard Height: 42"

EASY ASSEMBLY – Everything you need is efficiently packed into one box and shipped straight to your door; all parts, tools and instructions are conveniently located in the zippered compartment of the headboard for easy, two-person assembly in under an hour
Worry-free 5 year limited warranty included; mattress sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,906 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
